index.title: Ethan's Tech Blog
index.description: A blog consisting of first-hand experiences with technology, solutions to gotchas and bugs I've found in programs. And sometimes just reviews of a new application that I've used

git-crash-course.title: Git Crash Course
git-crash-course.description: A short tutorial on some of the basics of using Git version control.

how-this-site-was-made.title: How this site was made
how-this-site-was-made.description: An (out of date) overview of how this website was made. I used my XeMark language as a static site generator for one of the versions of my website.

time-catcher-part1.title: Time Catcher Part 1
time-catcher-part1.description: The first of a 3 part blog post where I kept running commentary as I created my TimeCatcher programmer.

time-catcher-part2.title: Time Catcher Part 2! (Alpha)
time-catcher-part2.description: The second part of the 3 part blog series on my program, Timecather. In this post I talk about a few of the algorithms used within the programmer and a couple other interesting pieces of the code.

time-catcher-part3.title: Time Catcher Part 3
time-catcher-part3.description: The third part of the TimeCatcher program series, discussion on implementation of pausing and deleting tasks within the program.

stack-smashing.title: Stack Smashing
stack-smashing.description: A short post about how I ran into an interesting case of Stack Smashing while working on the GreenUp VT REST API written in C.

shortcodes-routing-wordpress.title: Short Codes and Routing in WordPress
shortcodes-routing-wordpress.description: While creating a WordPress module for work, I wanted to serve up a php page, nothing particularly WordPress-y about it, but I ran into some interesting snags that I documented.

numbers-as-markers-google-maps.title: Numbers as Markers on Google Maps
numbers-as-markers-google-maps.description: How to have custom markers on a google map that show numbers

html-templates-and-handlebars.title: HTML Templates and Handlebar
html-templates-and-handlebars.description: While looking into some new technology, I ended up messing around with HTML Templates and thought they were cool enough to write about

post__in-returning-results-with-empty-ar.title: Empty Post__in WordPress problem
post__in-returning-results-with-empty-ar.description: A short description of a small problem I ran into while using the WP_Query class with an Empty post__in field.

college-friend-chicken.title: My Cooking Recipes
college-friend-chicken.description: Blog post about creating the first design and implementation of the cooking section of my website.

hosts-file-deployment.title: Hosts file and Testing deployment
hosts-file-deployment.description: A easy way to trick your computer into using a test environment with a live URL.

chunked-encoding-for-reports.title: Using Chunked Encoding for Reporting in Wordpress
chunked-encoding-for-reports.description: When writing pages that have a lot of output, it's beneficial to use Chunked Encoding rather than Content-length, this post talks about doing it for reporting screens in WordPress

php-wrong-date-half-hour.title: Incorrect Time in PHP despite Timezone
php-wrong-date-half-hour.description: A weird configuration problem with TimeZone settings in PHP and how it was fixed.

harp-and-smut.title: Harp and Smut
harp-and-smut.description: A short post about the first time I used Harp to create a website

varnish.title: Varnish and API Servers
varnish.description: How to configure Varnish for cachingg of RESTful resources for API Servers, the GreenUp Server configuration is used as an example

wordpress-gripes.title: Gripes with wordpress's postmeta and autoload
wordpress-gripes.description: A short tirade about how poor defaults for indexes and shoddy plugins can cause a large amount of pain for a WordPress site's performance

resource-replace.title: Resource Replace, update js and css domain links
resource-replace.description: Information about a small plugin to update javascript and css domain names for easier CDN usage for WordPress sites that I wrote.

wordpress-form-name-error.title: 404 Error from WordPress Form Submit with an input named 'name'
wordpress-form-name-error.description: Discovery of a bit of an oddity in WordPress's form input names, you can't have one named 'name'!

adding-actions-to-user-lists.title: Adding Actions to the WordPress User Lists
adding-actions-to-user-lists.description: How to add links and actions to the 'users.php' page of WordPress via filters.

varnish-directors.title: Varnish Directors and API Caching
varnish-directors.description: How to setup round robin, and health checks for multiple back ends behind Varnish HTTP Cache. GreenUp VT API Server as a case study.

green-up-vt-app.title: Green Up Vermont
green-up-vt-app.description: A short look into what the Green Up VT launch day was like for the developers at XenonApps who monitored the application all day.

serial-hill-climber-golang.title: Serial Hill Climber in GoLang
serial-hill-climber-golang.description: My first foray into GoLang, creating a simple serial hill climber (the simplest of all evolutionary algorithms) in GoLang. Using some of the concurrent features of Go make it a very powerful language for Evolutionary method implementations.

item-processor-example.title: Spring Batch ItemProcessListener Example
item-processor-example.description: I couldn't find an example of an item processor being used anywhere, so I decided to make one myself! A simple and quick example of how to use an ItemProcessListener from Spring Batch's
